meanings.definition: Consisting of various types or elements
meanings.sent1: The store sold assorted candies in a big jar.
meanings.sent2: She picked an assorted bouquet of flowers for her mother.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled an assorted mix of animals out of his hat.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an assorted puzzle, each piece unique.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was filled with assorted jewels of all colors.

meanings.sent1: The buffet offered assorted dishes from different cuisines.
meanings.sent2: The artist displayed an assorted collection of paintings at the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The classroom was an assorted blend of students from various countries.
meanings.sent4: The garden was an assorted canvas of blooming flowers.
meanings.sent5: The bookshelf held an assorted selection of novels and poetry.

meanings.sent1: The gift basket was filled with assorted goodies.
meanings.sent2: The box contained an assorted mix of tools and gadgets.
meanings.sent3: The party favors were an assorted mix of toys and treats.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe was an assorted collection of colors and styles.
meanings.sent5: The picnic blanket was spread with an assorted array of snacks.
